top.title: US investigators are using AI to detect child abuse images made by AI
top.summary: “It can be generalizable.” This tool, Guo says, is what the Cyber Crimes Center will be using to evaluate CSAM. He adds that Hive benchmarks its detection tools for each specific use case its customers have in mind. “The sheer volume of digital content circulating online necessitates the use of automated tools to process and analyze data efficiently,” the filing reads.

top.title: How AI and Wikipedia have sent vulnerable languages into a doom spiral
top.summary: “It might be a good thing that there isn’t a Google Translate in Inari Saami.” That may be true—though large language models like ChatGPT can be made to translate phrases into languages that more traditional machine translation tools do not offer. He worries that younger generations in Canada, hoping to learn languages in communities that have fought uphill battles against discrimination to pass on their heritage, might turn to online tools such as ChatGPT or phrasebooks on Amazon and simply make matters worse. Modelos.title: Google DeepMind unveils its first “thinking” robotics AI
Modelos.summary: That's the foundation of Google DeepMind's Gemini Robotics project, which has announced a pair of new models that work together to create the first robots that "think" before acting. Traditional LLMs have their own set of problems , but the introduction of simulated reasoning did significantly upgrade their capabilities, and now the same could be happening with AI robotics. Gemini Robotics 1.5: Learning Across Embodiments The two new models are known as Gemini Robotics 1.5 and Gemini Robotics-ER 1.5.

YouTube Music is testing AI hosts that will interrupt your tunes
Modelos.summary: The streaming site says Labs will offer a glimpse of the AI features it's developing for YouTube Music, and it starts with AI "hosts" that will chime in while you're listening to music. After joining, the YouTube Music app will get a new button on the Now Playing screen with the familiar Gemini sparkle logo. The new AI music hosts are supposed to provide a richer listening experience, according to YouTube .

Modelos.title: El fantasma de IBM: el gran reto de Satya Nadella es evitar que Microsoft termine convertida en un fósil tecnológico
Modelos.summary: El concepto de microordenador por el que apostó la compañía se basaba en su propia arquitectura, llamada Virtual Address eXtension (de ahí VAX), pero esa tecnología acabó siendo aplastada por la que triunfaría en aquella época: la arquitectura RISC. Aquella máquina le entusiasmó de tal manera que Nadella tuvo claro su futuro: quería dedicarse a la informática. Más que eso: quería dedicarse a la informática y trabajar para DEC.

DeepMind AI safety report explores the perils of “misaligned” AI
Herramientas.summary: DeepMind AI safety report explores the perils of “misaligned” AI DeepMind releases version 3.0 of its AI Frontier Safety Framework with new tips to stop bad bots. DeepMind recently released version 3.0 of the framework to explore more ways AI could go off the rails, including the possibility that models could ignore user attempts to shut them down. Researchers at Google DeepMind spend a lot of time thinking about how generative AI systems can become threats, detailing it all in the company's Frontier Safety Framework.

Mercado.title: Trump is pushing leucovorin as a treatment for autism. What is it?
Mercado.summary: At a press conference on Monday, President Trump announced that his administration was taking action to address “the meteoric rise in autism.” He suggested that childhood vaccines and acetaminophen, the active ingredient in Tylenol, are to blame for the increasing prevalence and advised pregnant women against taking the medicine. The president also blamed the painkiller Tylenol for autism, but the evidence doesn’t stack up at all. Trump is pushing leucovorin as a treatment for autism.

Mercado.title: Shoplifters could soon be chased down by drones
Mercado.summary: It could bring aerial surveillance to shopping centers, warehouses, and hospitals. Companies in the US can now place Flock’s drone docking stations on their premises. If the company has a waiver from the Federal Aviation Administration to fly beyond visual line of sight (these are becoming easier to get ), its security team can fly the drones within a certain radius, often a few miles.

Fusion power plants don’t exist yet, but they’re making money anyway
Mercado.summary: By Casey Crownhart archive page September 25, 2025 Commonwealth Fusion Systems This week, Commonwealth Fusion Systems announced it has another customer for its first commercial fusion power plant, in Virginia. Eni, one of the world’s largest oil and gas companies, signed a billion-dollar deal to buy electricity from the facility. Related Story An oil and gas giant signed a $1 billion deal with Commonwealth Fusion Systems The power purchase agreement makes Eni the second major customer for Commonwealth’s first commercial fusion power plant.

El CEO de la compañía, Cristiano Amon, confirmó que ya están trabajando en el 6G y es más: ya tienen fecha para los primeros dispositivos.
